name: HeadmasterDumbledore
0:
”Alexa ask Headmaster Dumbledore to award ten points to Hufflepuff”
”Alexa ask Headmaster Dumbledore to take away ten points from Hufflepuff”
”Alexa ask Headmaster Dumbledore to declare the winning house”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: headmaster dumbledore
des:
Turn your house into the magical Hogwarts school!

Group your children into the four Hogwarts houses and ask Headmaster Dumbledore to award points to them for good behavior. Not happy with your kid's behavior? Take away some points from their house ;-) 

Psst, wish to see your own goofy spell read aloud by Alexa? Just add it as a review at amazon.com and if it is nice and funny, we will add it to this skill so that the whole world gets to hear it!


Phrases to try out:
- Alexa, ask Headmaster Dumbledore to give hundred points to Slytherin.
- Alexa, ask Headmaster Dumbledore to take away fifty points from Slytherin.
- Alexa, ask Headmaster Dumbledore to declare the winning house.
- Alexa, ask Headmaster Dumbledore to clear all points for Slytherin.
- Alexa, ask Headmaster Dumbledore to reset the scores.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
